complexity.desc: Run code complexity checker against *.js files in lib/ directory

lint.desc: Lint *.js files in lib/ and test/ directories

nuke.desc: Kill all processes with command containing the string 'node'

package.desc: Create an artifact file in .bob/artifact/ directory

publish.desc: Publish artifact file to a repository

send.desc: Send artifact file to a remote server

test.desc: Execute unit test files in test/ directory

test-acceptance.desc: Execute acceptance test files in test-acceptance/ directory

test-integration.desc: Execute integration test files in test-integration/ directory

test-performance.desc: Execute performance test files in test-performance/ directory

updep.desc: Upgrade all dependencies to latest version

versionup.desc: Upgrade patch version number in package.json file
